segments.text: This kitchen drawing captures such domestic normalcy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman at the sink, towel in hand, plate shining.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the overflowâ€”water everywhere, what sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clueless, standing right in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy balanced precariously on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hand deep in the jar, greedy little thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl begging with her open palm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window frames a pretty garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Path and plants look so orderly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, it's a wet, tipping mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Ick, the whole scene feels off.
segments.speaker: PAR
